note:
Too many years in tech as a software dev, integration dev, infra guy, devops guy, full stack dude, team lead, manager, whatever. As Johnny Cash once sang, "I've been everywhere, man."

The one lesson I've learned over the years is that there is still so much more to learn...

So many interests but right now I'm very much into (in no particular order) generalized computing end user apps or in the data centre, sustainable multi-mode transit, and just about any sort of gaming you can imagine.
